channel.title: Fin Donnelly
channel.description: Recent news about Fin Donnelly, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Alberni Valley News
item.description:
MP's bill aims to protect Sproat Lake
... session of Parliament to restore protection to Sproat Lake. Garrison, Burnaby-Douglas MP Kennedy Stewart and New Westminster-Coquitlam MP Fin Donnelly were all at the Mars waterbomber base at Sproat Lake to make the announcement on Tuesday.

item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
NDP MP Donnelly vows to continue fight to ban shark fin imports into Canada ...
Photograph by Steve Gerecke, The Hill Times. NDP MP Fin Donnelly, pictured at a recent House committee meeting, is trying to get Canada to ban shark fin imports One-third of the estimated 100 million sharks being slaughtered annually is facing extinction.
